{{cpp/ranges/iota_view/title|begin}}
{{cpp/ranges/iota_view/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++20|
constexpr /*iterator*/ begin() const;
}}

Obtains an {{rlp|iterator}} to the beginning value.

===Return value===
{{box|{{rlpi|iterator}}{{sep}}{{c/core|{}}{{rlpsi|/#value_}}{{sep}}{{c/core|}&lt;!----&gt;}}}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;ranges&gt;

int main()
{
    auto iota{std::views::iota(2, 6)};
    auto iter{iota.begin()};
    while (iter != iota.end())
        std::cout &lt;&lt; *iter++ &lt;&lt; ' ';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
2 3 4 5
}}
